ai.summary: A tiny, easy urban loop of about 0.1 km around the area near Cockfosters Underground Station in London, perfect for a quick stroll or a short transit-side break.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat pavement and sidewalks with occasional grassy verges. Entire loop is urban and well-lit, suitable for all ages.
ai.safety_notes: As an urban route: be aware of traffic and crossing streets, watch for pedestrians and cyclists, and stay on designated sidewalks. Wear appropriate clothing for UK weather and avoid poorly lit times after dark.
recommended_gear: Smartphone with map or transit app
ai.best_seasons: Year-round in the UK; spring and autumn offer mild weather, summer is warm but can be crowded near stations, and winter can be chilly and dark.
